title: How to make a Pudsey Pumpkin
text:
Having a a halloween party this year? Why not turn it into a fundraising event for BBC Children in Need?

You will need

A pumpkin

A scooper

A pumpkin carving knife

A pumpkin puncturer

Pins

A tea light and/or LED lights

Step 1

Use the carving knife to cut around the crown of the pumpkin and remove it- put it to one side for later.

Step 2

Use the scoop to scoop out all the seeds and flesh from inside the pumpkin and dispose of these

Step 3

Draw or print out an image of Pudsey's head to the correct size for your pumpkin and cut out the outline and features such as nose, eyes and spots. Pin this to the side of the pumpkin.

Step 4

Draw around the sections you would like to cut out with a marker pen and then remove the template.

Step 5

Use the puncturing tool to puncture the corners of each section to be cut out. You can then place the carving knife into this holes and cut along the edges of the sections before removing them.

Step 6

Wipe off any remaining pen marks and add a tealight and/or LED lights to into the cavity of the pumpkin, replacing the crown.

Enjoy your spooky Pudsey pumpkin!
description: How to make a Pudsey Pumpkin
